v.v: Yahweh, you have acted kindly toward us people who live in this land;
You forgave us, your people, for the sins that we had committed;
You stopped being angry with us
Now, God, the only one who can save us, stop being angry with us
Will you continue to be angry with us forever?
Please enable us to prosper again
Yahweh, by rescuing us from our troubles,
I want to listen to what Yahweh our God says
He is surely ready to save those who have an awesome respect for him,
When that happens, he will both faithfully love us and faithfully do for us what he promised to do;
Here on earth, we will be loyal to God,
Yes, Yahweh will do good things for us,

v: you have enabled us Israelite people to become prosperous again.
you pardoned us for all our sins.
and turned away from severely punishing us.
so that we, your people, will rejoice about what you have done for us.
show us that you faithfully love us.
because he promises that he will enable us, his people, to live peacefully
if we do not return to doing foolish things.
so that his glory will remain in our land.
we will act righteously, and he will give us peace,
which will be like a kiss that he gives us.
and from heaven, God will act justly toward us.
and there will be great harvests in our land.
he acts righteously wherever he goes.
